name: Someone's Watching Me!
summary_text: A woman is being watched in her apartment by a stranger, who also calls and torments her. A cat-and-mouse game begins.

name: Noah Land
summary_text: Suffering through a mid-life crisis, Omer has to face the angry villagers in order to realize his estranged father's dying wish to be buried under the enshrined Noah Tree which his father claims to have planted half a century ago.

name: La virgen de los sicarios
summary_text: The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin ...                See full summary »

name: Kuryer
summary_text: The story of a teenager boy in times of the comunism fall in the Soviet Union.

name: Slow Burn
summary_text: A district attorney is involved in a 24-hour showdown with a gang leader and is, at the same time, being manipulated by an attractive assistant district attorney and a cryptic stranger.

name: Casual Sex?
summary_text: With high hopes on their quest to track down The Perfect Man, two girls take a vacation at a plush health resort. But unfortunately, the men they encounter seem to wilt at the thought of anything more than Casual Sex.

name: The Gumball Rally
summary_text: An eclectic group of people takes part in a secret, and illegal, cross country road race.

name: Panic in Year Zero!
summary_text: A family leaves L.A. for a camping trip - just before a nuclear bomb destroys the city. As the city descends into chaos, the father must fight to keep his family alive.

name: Last Days in the Desert
summary_text: An imagined chapter from Jesus' forty days of fasting and praying in the desert. On his way out of the wilderness, Jesus struggles with the Devil over the fate of a family in crisis.

name: Body Cam
summary_text: When a routine traffic stop results in the unexplained, grisly death of her colleague, a cop realizes footage of the incident will play for her eyes only. As the attacks mount, she races to understand the supernatural force behind them.

name: The Double Hour
summary_text: A chambermaid and an ex-cop meet at a speed dating event and a romance develops. But during a romantic getaway things suddenly take a dark turn.

name: Murari
summary_text: A family is under a curse due to an old sin; due to which a male is bound to die every 48 years.

name: Nuestros amantes
summary_text: One man, one woman, one rule: not fall in love.

name: Kidô keisatsu patorebâ: The Movie 2
summary_text: When a terrorist attack is blamed on the Air Force, Special Vehicle Unit 2 gets caught in the middle of a growing political conflict.

name: Crimes of the Heart
summary_text: Three southern sisters try to come to grips with the meaning of their mother's suicide.

name: Invasion
summary_text: With the fall of the alien ship Julia's life changed, now three years later mankind is about to experience new encounter.

name: The Princess of Montpensier
summary_text: Bertrand Tavernier is in top form with this gripping, superbly mounted drama set against the savage Catholic/Protestant wars that ripped France apart in the 16th century. Based on a novella...                See full summary »

name: Bob the Butler
summary_text: Tom Green stars as a bumbling buffoon, who lands at Butling after working his way through all other 'A' and 'B' jobs.

name: Why Do Fools Fall in Love
summary_text: Three women each claim to be the widow of 1950s doo-wop singer Frankie Lymon, claiming legal rights to his estate.

name: Summer Stock
summary_text: A small-town farmer, down on her luck, finds her homestead invaded by a theatrical troupe invited to stay by her ne'er-do-well sister.

name: 100 Streets
summary_text: Three people, three extraordinary stories. All lived out within a hundred London streets.

name: Dear Dictator
summary_text: When political turmoil forces a British-Caribbean dictator to flee his island nation, he seeks refuge and hides with a rebellious teenage girl in suburban America, and ends up teaching the young teen how to start a revolution and overthrow the "mean girls" at her high school.

name: Molke Soleiman
summary_text: Solomon, Prophet and the King, has asked God to give him an ideal kingdom which has never been given to anybody before. He is told to prepare himself and his subjects with evil and unearthly creatures that haunt the men.

name: Meadowland
summary_text: A year after their son goes missing, a couple handle the loss in varying ways, growing apart from one another and their reality.

name: Revenge of the Green Dragons
summary_text: Two best friends rise through the ranks of New York's Chinese underworld in the 1980s.

name: Salting the Battlefield
summary_text: MI5 officer Johnny Worricker and Margot Tyrell are on the run together across Europe. But Worricker knows his only chance of resolving his problems is to return home and confront his nemesis, the prime minister.

name: Room on the Broom
summary_text: To the annoyance of her cat a kindly witch allows a dog, a bird and a frog who have helped her retrieve things she has lost to ride on her broomstick, making it top heavy. The broom is ...                See full summary »

name: Dokunmayin Sabanima
summary_text: Okkes is suppose to marry Oya with arranged marrige, but he wants to meet the girl first and as is turns out Oya was thinking the same thing they disguise themselves as personal driver and ...                See full summary »

name: Countess Dracula
summary_text: In 17th-century Hungary, elderly widow Countess Elisabeth Nádasdy maintains her misleading youthful appearance by bathing in the blood of virgins regularly supplied to her by faithful servant Captain Dobi.

name: The Abominable Snowman
summary_text: A kindly English botanist and a gruff American scientist lead an expedition to the Himalayas in search of the legendary Yeti.

name: Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier
summary_text: American frontiersman Davy Crockett fights in the Creek Indian War, is elected to the U.S. Congress and fights for Texas at the Alamo.

name: Sylvia Scarlett
summary_text: When her father decides to flee to England, young Sylvia Scarlett must become Sylvester Scarlett and protect her father every step of the way, with the questionable help of plenty others.

name: Meantime
summary_text: When one brother gets a job from their wealthy aunt, the other becomes increasingly jealous.

name: Love at Second Sight
summary_text: A man tries to make his wife fall in love with him again, after waking up in an alternate reality where she never knew him.

name: Euphoria
summary_text: Sisters in conflict travelling through Europe toward a mystery destination.

name: Bullett Raja
summary_text: A common man who transforms into a gangster revolts against the very system he once obediently followed by declaring war on the police, the government, and the industrialists.

name: Patrick: Evil Awakens
summary_text: At a private clinic, a young nurse soon discovers that one of the comatose patients is quite sinister.

name: Padre Padrone
summary_text: The son of a shepherd embarks in the quest of emancipating himself from a tough lifestyle that his condition and his father force on him.

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Prisoners of the Sky
summary_text: The Seven Deadly Sins travel to the Sky Temple in search of an elusive ingredient.

name: Visiting Hours
summary_text: A deranged, misogynistic killer assaults a journalist. When he discovers that she survived the attack, he follows her to the hospital to finish her off.

name: The Virginity Hit
summary_text: Four guys, one camera, and their experience chronicling the exhilarating and terrifying rite of passage: losing your virginity. As these guys help their buddy get laid, they'll have to ...                See full summary »

name: Le moine
summary_text: Madrid, in the seventeenth century. Abandoned at the doorstep of a monastery, Ambrosio has been brought up by the Capucin Friars. After becoming a friar himself, he becomes an unrivaled ...                See full summary »

name: Man Facing Southeast
summary_text: A patient in a mental hospital claims to be an extraterrestial. Could he be right?

name: Bad Company
summary_text: A God-fearing Ohio boy dodging the Civil War draft arrives in St. Joseph, MO where he joins up with a hardscrabble group of like runaways heading west

name: Whirlpool
summary_text: A woman suffering from kleptomania is hypnotized in an attempt to cure her. Soon afterwards, she's found at the scene of a murder with no memory of how she got there, and seemingly no way to prove her innocence.

name: My Family
summary_text: A man makes his way from Mexico to L.A. in the 1920s, gets married and raises a big family there. The movie follows the children until they, too, get married and have children in the 1960s.

name: Campfire Tales
summary_text: A group of teens entertain themselves by telling an anthology of famous urban legends with a modern twist; including make-out-point, monsters, psychopaths, and ghosts.

name: Bitter Rice
summary_text: Two criminals on the run end up working in a rice field and decide to recruit other workers for their next robbery.

name: Pataakha
summary_text: Based on Charan Singh Pathik's short story Do Behnein, Pataakha narrates the story of two feuding sisters who realize the true nature of their relationship only after marriage "separates" them.

name: Ginny Weds Sunny
summary_text: The film follows headstrong Ginny who meets Sunny for an arranged marriage, but turns him down, and then shows how Sunny teams up with Ginny's mother to win her love.

name: Cake
summary_text: A travel writer (Graham) who begrudgingly assumes control of her father's wedding magazine finds the new experience might just change her take on love.

name: Brindaavanam
summary_text: Bhoomi does not want to get married and lies, saying that she has a boyfriend. Her friend Indu asks her boyfriend Krish to pretend to be Bhoomi's lover. He impresses Bhoomi's family but a surprise awaits him.

name: Goodbye Lover
summary_text: Ben and Sandra are hot and provocative lovers, but Sandra is unfortunately married to Ben's younger brother Jake, and soon Jake will find out about Ben.

name: Under Suspicion
summary_text: In Brighton in 1959, disgraced cop turned private detective Tony Aaron works largely on falsifying adulteries for use as evidence in divorce cases. He involves his wife as the fictional ...                See full summary »

name: Made in China
summary_text: Story of Failed Gujarati Businessman, who jumps into unknown world of China to get once in a life time business idea, which will change his life.

name: City Hunter
summary_text: Nicky Larson, the best private investigator in the business, is called for a high-risk mission: to recover the perfume of Cupid, a perfume that would make irresistible the one who uses it.

name: Debi
summary_text: A story following the life of Ranu (Joya Ahsan) and her paranormal powers. She goes to psychiatrist Misir Ali (Chanchal Chowdhury) to find an answer to all her questions.

name: Vive la France
summary_text: Muzafar and Feruz are two good-hearted shepherds from Taboulistan... a tiny country in Central Asia that no one has ever heard of. In order to bring his country into the international ...                See full summary »

name: Moving Violations
summary_text: The goofy students of a remedial drivers education class find themselves butting heads with their abusive police instructors.

name: The Mean Season
summary_text: When a teenager is shot at the beach, a journalist from The Miami Journal is sent to cover the story. He's called by the murderer and told there'll be four more.

name: Monsters of Man
summary_text: A US weapons manufacturer tests its 4 killer robots on heroin producers in the Golden Triangle in SEAsia. It goes haywire.

name: Küçük Esnaf
summary_text: A small-time locksmith is left to pay late his father's debts to the mob, falling in love with a lawyer who's also in deep trouble.

name: The St. Valentine's Day Massacre
summary_text: Al Capone's Valentine's Day surprise for the rival Bugs Moran gang in 1929 Chicago.

name: Right Now, Wrong Then
summary_text: A married film director falls for a young painter - twice.

name: Se Dio vuole
summary_text: A young man's decision to become a priest affects his whole family, especially his father.

name: Naanum Rowdy Thaan
summary_text: A wannabe rowdy who falls for a hearing-impaired girl faces a dilemma when the girl makes a shocking request.

name: Chinese Roulette
summary_text: Both the parents of a young teen who walks with crutches, goes on each their secret meeting with lovers, both surprising each other at the family's county home. The daughter arrives and initiates a guessing game of "Chinese roulette".

name: Your Name Engraved Herein
summary_text: In 1987, as martial law ends in Taiwan, Jia-han and Birdy fall in love amid family pressure, homophobia and social stigma.

name: Afterwards
summary_text: Newly divorced lawyer Nathan Del Amico is shaken up after he meets a doctor who claims that he can sense when select people are about to die.

name: Prescription: Murder
summary_text: A psychiatrist uses a patient he is having an affair with to help him kill his wife, but his perfect alibi may come apart at the hands of a seemingly befuddled LAPD lieutenant.

name: Brotherhood
summary_text: Sam is facing up to the new world. He realizes it also comes with new problems and new challenges and which will require old friends to help him survive new dangers.

name: Northern Soul
summary_text: Set in 1974, an authentic and uplifting tale of two friends whose horizons are opened up by the discovery of black American soul music.

name: Vikramarkudu
summary_text: Vikram Rathod, a policeman, joins with a small time thief Satthi Babu who looks identical to him to avenge his own destruction.

name: Scooby-Doo Meets the Boo Brothers
summary_text: After the death of Shaggy's Uncle Beaureguard, he, Scooby, and Scrappy arrive at his uncle's plantation to collect the inheritance. But as soon as they arrive, they find it is haunted by ...                See full summary »

name: Edge of Winter
summary_text: When two brothers are stranded by a brutal winter storm with an unpredictable father they barely know, the boys begin to suspect their supposed protector may be their biggest threat.

name: The Well Digger's Daughter
summary_text: In 1930s southern France, a father is torn between his sense of honor and his deep love for his daughter when she gets in trouble with the wealthy son of a shopkeeper.

name: Fat Slags
summary_text: The Fat Slags from Viz hit the big time and become celebrities.

name: Daria in 'Is It Fall Yet?'
summary_text: This animated made-for-TV movie, based on MTV's hit "Daria," explores the summer vacation of Daria and her classmates at Lawndale High.

name: La niña de tus ojos
summary_text: A company of Spanish movie makers leaves Franco's Spain and moves to Hitler's Germany to make a film in co-production. Soon some problems start to arise...

name: In a Year with 13 Moons
summary_text: A transgender woman tries to salvage something from the wreckage love has made of her life by confronting her anguished past, hoping to find ultimate acceptance among quondam acquaintances and herself.

name: The Giant Spider Invasion
summary_text: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

name: The Painting Pool
summary_text: Maryam (Negar Javaherian) and Reza (Shahab Hosseini) are different from other people, it's not just a simple difference, but a very big difference. They must try to prove to others they ...                See full summary »

name: Mehman-e maman
summary_text: A mother of a poor family, has guests coming over, yet doesn't know how to get the dinner party altogether with limited resources.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
summary_text: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a horribly disfigured composer, who has plans for those who oppose him or the young singer.

name: Bawarchi
summary_text: A dysfunctional middle-class family is transformed due to the influence of their new multi-talented household servant - but he might be too good to be true.

name: The Devil's Eye
summary_text: Don Juan is sent from Hell to Earth with a mission - to seduce a 20 years old virgin in order to spoil her pure wedding. The mission becomes crazy when Don Juan falls in love for the first time in centuries.

name: Destination Moon
summary_text: After their latest rocket fails, Dr. Charles Cargraves and retired General Thayer have to start over again. This time, Gen. Thayer approaches Jim Barnes, the head of his own aviation ...                See full summary »

name: The Last Horror Movie
summary_text: A serial killer uses a horror video rental to lure his next victim. What begins as a teen slasher transforms into a disturbing journey through the mind of Max Parry, a mild mannered wedding photographer with a taste for human flesh.

name: The First Power
summary_text: A dedicated L.A. police detective and a female psychic must stop a demonic serial killer who was given the powers of resurrection, teleportation and possession.

name: Winnetou
summary_text: When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.

name: The Hunters
summary_text: A family of archeologists hunt down artifacts from fairy tales that have been hidden around the globe.

name: Kill Buljo: The Movie
summary_text: A Norwegian parody of Kill Bill.

name: Awaara
summary_text: A poor young man named Raj joins a criminal gang to feed his mother. But when he falls in love with Rita, he decides to reform himself for her.

name: 6 Balloons
summary_text: A woman (Jacobson) learns her brother (Franco) has relapsed on heroin.

name: O'Horten
summary_text: A drama focused on a life-changing moment in 67-year-old train engineer Odd Horten's existence: the evening of his retirement.

name: Goodnight, Mister Tom
summary_text: A shy and quiet World War II evacuee is housed by a disgruntled old man, and they soon develop a close bond.

name: Munnariyippu
summary_text: Anjali, a freelance journalist meets C.K. Raghavan, an interesting inmate who's outstaying his sentence in jail for a crime he says he didn't commit. His vastly different views peak her interest and she documents his life and happenings.

name: Indigenous
summary_text: A group of friends travel to Panama where they convince a local woman to guide them into the jungle. However, when their guide goes missing, they realize that they've stumbled into the lair of horrific, bloodthirsty creatures.

name: West Beirut
summary_text: In April, 1975, civil war breaks out; Beirut is partitioned along a Moslem-Christian line. Tarek is in high school, making Super 8 movies with his friend, Omar. At first the war is a lark: ...                See full summary »

name: Tehran Taboo
summary_text: In their desperate search for freedom and happiness, four young people from Tehran, Iran are forced to break the taboos of a restrictive, islamic society.

name: Masss
summary_text: After a life-threatening accident, a man finds that he can communicate with the dead, and must decide whether to act on their advice.

name: Blind
summary_text: A novelist blinded in a car crash which killed his wife rediscovers his passion for both life and writing when he embarks on an affair with the neglected wife of an indicted businessman.

name: Homeless to Harvard: The Liz Murray Story
summary_text: Based on a true story. Liz Murray is a young girl who is taken care of by her loving, but drug-addicted parents. Liz becomes homeless at 15 and after a tragedy comes upon her, she begins her work to finish high school.

name: Afonya
summary_text: A carefree plumber spends his days drinking and chasing women, but the emptiness of his life starts catching up to him.

name: The Sound of Music Live!
summary_text: A live telecast of the famous Rodgers and Hammerstein musical.

name: Gise Memuru
summary_text: Quiet and introverted toll booth clerk Kenan's life, a humdrum routine between the Tavsancik toll booth plaza and his home, will change the day the new operations chief comes to inspect Tavsancik.

name: George and the Dragon
summary_text: A knight returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon and becomes a legend.

name: The Perfect Match
summary_text: A playboy named Charlie, convinced that all his relationships are dead, meets the beautiful and mysterious Eva. Agreeing to a casual affair, Charlie then wants a bit more from their relationship.

name: Jason's Lyric
summary_text: Two brothers, survivors of family tragedy, take different life paths: one falls for a high-spirited waitress and dreams of success, the other follows a life of petty crime. Their lives reconnect in shattering fashion.

name: The Devil and Miss Jones
summary_text: A tycoon goes undercover to ferret out agitators at a department store, but gets involved in their lives instead.

name: Elisa & Marcela
summary_text: In 1901, Elisa Sanchez Loriga took on the identity of Mario Sánchez to marry her lover of fifteen years, Marcela Gracia Ibeas.

name: Almost Friends
summary_text: Charlie is an unmotivated man in his mid 20s still living at home with his mother and stepfather who falls for a young woman who has a serious boyfriend.

name: How to Be
summary_text: A young man having an existential crisis convinces a Canadian self-help guru to come to London and become his personal life coach.

name: The King and I

name: Firestorm
summary_text: Firefighter Jesse Graves has to save ornithologist Jennifer and other people caught in a forest fire, which was set up by the lawyer of convicted killer Earl Shaye, who escaped from the ...                See full summary »

name: Premature Burial
summary_text: An artist grows distant from his new wife as an irrational horror of premature burial consumes him.

name: The Beautiful Country
summary_text: After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live.

name: Born Yesterday
summary_text: A businessman comes to Washington with his ex Vegas showgirl girlfriend, and after some embarrassments, he hires a reporter as tutor to smarten her up. She turns out to be smart, sucks up knowledge and questions things. Trouble?

name: Ben 10: Alien Swarm
summary_text: Against his grandfather's orders, Ben Tennyson teams up with the daughter of an old enemy in order to prevent an alien infestation of earth.

name: Murder
summary_text: Unhappy with her marriage with workaholic man, a woman finds solace in her lover and starts a steamy affair. But this fills her with guilt and leaves him, but he is determined to get her - at any cost.

name: Bobby Jones: Stroke of Genius
summary_text: Jim Caviezel stars as golf legend Bobby Jones, the icon who retired from competition at the tender age of 28.

name: Kilerów 2-óch
summary_text: Jurek Kiler (see the prequel to this movie, "Kiler") has become a VIP - sponsoring the Polish government, playing tennis with the President, and stuff. He must oversee a transfer of a ...                See full summary »

name: Bachelor Mother
summary_text: An unemployed woman discovers an abandoned baby on the steps of an orphanage, and accepts an offer to take responsibility for the child in return for a job.

name: Xenia
summary_text: Strangers in their own birthplace, 16-year-old Danny and 18-year-old Odysseus cross the entire country in search of their Greek father, after their Albanian mother passes away.

name: Battle of the Damned
summary_text: Following a deadly viral outbreak, private military soldier Max Gatling leads a handful of survivors and a ragtag band of robots against an army of the infected.

name: All Is True
summary_text: A look at the final days in the life of renowned playwright William Shakespeare.

name: The Perfect Weapon
summary_text: An expert in "kenpo" karate avenges his Koreatown friend, slain by a mobster in Los Angeles.

name: The Strange Color of Your Body's Tears
summary_text: Returning home from a business trip to discover his wife missing, a man delves deeper and deeper into a surreal kaleidoscope of half-baked leads, seduction, deceit, and murder. Does anyone in the building know something?

name: Conspiracy
summary_text: A wounded United States Marine discovers a corporate conspiracy designed to run illegal aliens out of an Arizona border town by any means necessary.

name: Sounder
summary_text: The oldest son of a loving and strong family of black sharecroppers comes of age in the Depression-era South after his father is imprisoned for stealing food.

name: Boy Eats Girl
summary_text: A boy declares his love for his girlfriend, only to die the same night. He is brought back to life by his mother as a flesh-craving zombie, who sires more teen undead while trying to control his, er, appetite for his beloved.

name: Saturday the 14th
summary_text: A family inherits an old mansion which houses the dangerous 'Book of Evil' that has all the monsters of the world trapped inside it.

name: A White, White Day
summary_text: An off duty police begins to suspect a local man for having had an affair with his recently dead wife. Gradually his obsession for finding out the truth accumulates and inevitably begins to endanger himself and his loved ones.

name: Wander
summary_text: After getting hired to probe a suspicious death in the small town of Wander, a mentally unstable private investigator becomes convinced the case is linked to the same 'conspiracy cover up' that caused the death of his daughter.

name: In Dubious Battle
summary_text: An activist gets caught up in the labor movement for farm workers in California during the 1930s.

name: Le Quattro Volte

name: Stormy Monday
summary_text: A crooked American businessman tries to push the shady influential owner of a nightclub in Newcastle, England to sell him the club. The club's new employee and the American's ex lover fall in love and inadvertently stir the pot.

name: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
summary_text: Adi and Sid want to make big but always run out of luck and series of confusion start taking place when they reach Goa.

name: Kanal-i-zasyon
summary_text: The story of the rise of a broadcaster. A television channel tells the funny events.

name: Strella
summary_text: Yorgos is released from prison after 14 years of incarceration for a murder he committed. He meets Strella, a young transsexual sex worker. They spend the night together and soon they fall in love. But the past is catching up with Yorgos.

name: Pokémon: Jirachi - Wish Maker
summary_text: A magician attempts to use the power of the Millennium Comet to awaken the legendary Pokémon Groudon.

name: Morometii
summary_text: The story of a family: Problems, marriage, taxes, revenge, friendship, army and much more.

name: Knife + Heart
summary_text: Paris, summer 1979. Anne is a producer of cheap gay porn. When Lois, her editor and companion, leaves her, she attempts to get her back by making a more ambitious film with the flamboyant Archibald.

name: The Return of the King
summary_text: Two Hobbits struggle to destroy the Ring in Mount Doom while their friends desperately fight evil Lord Sauron's forces in a final battle.

name: Cyrano de Bergerac
summary_text: The charismatic swordsman-poet helps another woo the woman he loves in this straightforward version of the play.

name: Sundays and Cybèle
summary_text: After killing a child when his plane crashes in a Vietnamese village, Pierre suffers from delayed stress and partial amnesia. Returning to France, he lives like a vegetable until he meets a...                See full summary »

name: Black Girl
summary_text: A black girl from Senegal becomes a servant in France.

name: Ruggles of Red Gap
summary_text: An English valet brought to the American west assimilates into the American way of life.

name: Mother and Son
summary_text: A man goes for a walk through the countryside with his dying mother.

name: Holiday Engagement
summary_text: Afraid to tell her family she's been dumped, Hillary hires an actor to play her fiancé during a four-day Thanksgiving weekend at her parents' house.

name: Horatio Hornblower: The Wrong War
summary_text: Lt. Hornblower and his mates are sent to accompany a doomed royalist invasion of revolutionary France.

name: Cairo Station
summary_text: A newspaper salesman at the train station in Cairo develops an unhealthy obsession with a woman who sells refreshments.

name: L'étudiante et Monsieur Henri
summary_text: An elderly curmudgeon lets out a room in his large apartment rent-free to a young student - on condition that she does everything in her power to ruin his son's marriage.

name: Plush
summary_text: A young singer/songwriter, despite being married, becomes involved with her new guitarist, who she soon discovers has a dark past and may be a danger to her and those close to her.

name: Silent Trigger
summary_text: Waxman is a former Special Forces soldier who is now working as a heavily armed assassin for a top secret government agency. When a covert mission goes terribly wrong, Waxman and fellow assassin Clegg become that agency's prime targets.

name: The Last Family
summary_text: The story of a well-known artistic family: legendary painter Zdzislaw Beksinski, his wife Zofia and their son Tomasz, a highly-praised music critic and translator. Their lives were far from being usual.

name: And While We Were Here
summary_text: While working on a writing project on the island of Ischia, a married woman (Bosworth) enters into an affair with a younger man.

name: Too Young to Die?
summary_text: An abused 15-year-old is charged with a murder that carries the death penalty.

name: Nomad: The Warrior
summary_text: A historical epic set in 18th-century Kazakhstan, where a young man is destined to unite the country's three warring tribes.

name: The Major
summary_text: In a car accident, a policeman accidentally killed a child. The other cops are trying to hush up the case.

name: Troublemakers
summary_text: Two brothers who hate each other are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

name: Les visiteurs: La révolution
summary_text: Knight Godefroy de Montmirail and squire Jacquouille are stranded in 1793. Using trickery to break free from their shackles, both perilously partake in the Montmirail family's run away in the quest for an exiting time-shift.

name: Love Field
summary_text: Devastated by President Kennedy's assassination, Dallas-based hairstylist Lurene Hallett boards a bus for the Washington funeral where she meets a perplexing father and his daughter who greatly impact her journey.

name: Manhattan Melodrama
summary_text: The friendship between two orphans endures even though they grow up on opposite sides of the law and fall in love with the same woman.

summary_text: A legendary hitman trying to retire for love, is poisoned by his mob boss foster father, forcing him to team up with an undercover cop to survive one final bloody night of revenge and redemption.

name: Madhouse
summary_text: A horror movie star returns to his famous role after years in a mental institution. But the character seems to be committing murders independent of his will.

name: Indru Netru Naalai
summary_text: Elango and his friend Pulivetti come into possession of a time machine and they start profiting from it. However, their meddling with time prevents the death of a gangster, who begins to wreak havoc in their lives.

summary_text: An unemployed man finds a money bag of $1.2 million after it dropped off an armored car.

name: Masoom
summary_text: A happy family goes through turbulent times because of a big mistake by one of the family members.

name: Blue Story
summary_text: Feature adaptation of Rapman's YouTube series about two young friends who become rivals in a street war.

name: Hors la loi
summary_text: A drama about the Algerian struggle for independence from France after WWII.

name: Gekijô-ban Naruto: Daigekitotsu! Maboroshi no chitei iseki dattebayo!
summary_text: Naruto, Shikamaru and Sakura are on a mission to deliver a lost pet to a village when a mysterious knight appear to confront them.

name: The Corsican File
summary_text: Rémi François is a detective who is hired to find Ange Leoni, a Corsican who apparently has inherited a 2 million euros house.

name: Dancing at the Blue Iguana
summary_text: A non-glamorous portrayal of the lives of people who make their living at a strip club.

name: The Ugly Dachshund
summary_text: The Garrisons live with a Great Dane who thinks he's a dainty dachshund. His identity crisis results in an uproarious series of household crises that reduce the Garrisons' house to shambles.

name: Eating Out 2: Sloppy Seconds
summary_text: After Marc dumps him, Kyle unites with Gwen and Tiffani to land sexually confused art model Troy by pretending to be straight. However, Marc wants Troy, too, and members from a notorious "ex-gay" group are slipping for the both of them.

name: Haraamkhor
summary_text: A selfish, manipulative schoolteacher takes advantage of a schoolgirl's vulnerability to gratify his dark, narcissistic desires.

name: Bernard and Doris
summary_text: The story of the twilight years of tobacco billionairess Doris Duke and her relationship with her gay butler, to whom she left her entire fortune.

name: Dream
summary_text: In the aftermath of a car crash, a man discovers his dreams are tied to a stranger's sleepwalking.

name: Beautiful
summary_text: Mona sacrifices everything, including family, in pursuit of a beauty pageant victory. Her friend Ruby helps her to an amazing degree.

name: The Ladies Man
summary_text: A clueless, recently single graduate unwittingly takes a job as a servant in a mansion inhabited by dozens of young women.

name: No Time for Sergeants
summary_text: Will Stockdale is a country bumpkin drafted into the Air Force and too dumb to realize he's driving everyone around him crazy, no one more than Sergeant King.

name: What They Had
summary_text: Bridget returns home at her brother's urging to deal with her ailing mother and her father's reluctance to let go of their life together.

name: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
summary_text: A union pensioner and his wife are robbed, but find that merely getting the assailants brought to justice is not enough for their consciences.

name: Maléfique
summary_text: Four prisoners find an ancient diary in the wall of their cell which might be the key to getting out.

name: Vincent & Theo
summary_text: The familiar tragic story of Vincent van Gogh is broadened by focusing as well on his brother Theodore, who helped support Vincent. The movie also provides a nice view of the locations which Vincent painted.

name: Apartment Zero
summary_text: Set in modern day Buenos Aires, the film centers around a relationship between two emotionally crippled roommates. Adrian LeDuc is a lonely sociopath who is forced to rent his insane ...                See full summary »

name: Tell It to the Bees
summary_text: In 1950s small town Britain, a doctor develops a relationship with her young patient's mother.

name: Aziz Ansari: Buried Alive
summary_text: Aziz Ansari focuses his unique viewpoint on pending adulthood, babies, marriage and love in the modern era.

name: Fill the Void
summary_text: When the older sister of Shira, an 18-year-old Hasidic Israeli, dies suddenly in childbirth, Shira must decide if she can and should marry her widowed brother-in-law, which also generates tensions within her extended family.

name: Lost in the Sun
summary_text: A small time crook and a newly-orphaned teenage boy team up to perform a string of robberies.

name: Stuck in the Suburbs
summary_text: Teenager Brittany is bored with her quiet suburban life. She finds excitement when her phone is switched with the phone of Jordan Cahill. Jordan, only the top teen pop singer, has come to her town to make a music video.

name: Maniac Cop 3: Badge of Silence
summary_text: A priest practicing the Voodoo arts resurrects Matt Cordell, who takes his badge and comes back from the dead to do his bidding.

name: The Crawling Eye
summary_text: A series of decapitations on a Swiss mountainside appear to be connected to a mysterious radioactive cloud.

name: The Beautiful Risk
summary_text: William, a respected artist who lost everything after his divorce, arrives in Montreal on a job prospect. When the job falls through he then is saved and forms an erotic relationship and exposes his soul with a young woman named Paulette.

name: Dil Toh Baccha Hai Ji
summary_text: Three roommates are in search of true love. They each find a girl with whom they fall head over heels in love with. Now they just have to get the women to reciprocate.

name: Tooth and Nail
summary_text: A group of people in a post-apocalyptic world fight to survive against a band of vicious cannibals.

name: Carnosaur
summary_text: A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and reeks havoc on the local desert town. A security guard and a girl environmentalist try to stop both it and the company's doomsday bioweapon.

name: Criminal Law
summary_text: A lawyer defends a killer, but soon after he wins, he finds out that the killer is guilty.

name: Land of the Pharaohs
summary_text: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of the tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.

name: Sorgenfri
summary_text: A family of four is quarantined in their home as a virulent strand of the flu spreads into town and they are forced to the extreme to escape alive.

name: Dead of Winter
summary_text: A fledgling actress is lured to a remote mansion for a screen-test, soon discovering she is actually a prisoner in the middle of a blackmail plot.

name: To the Devil a Daughter
summary_text: An American occult novelist battles to save the soul of a young girl from a group of Satanists, led by an excommunicated priest, who plan on using her as the representative of the Devil on Earth.

name: In the Shadow of Iris
summary_text: Iris, young wife of a banker, disappears in Paris. Maybe a mechanic with many debts is involved in the strange affair. A really complicated job for the police.

name: A Tale of Love and Darkness
summary_text: The story of Amos Oz's youth, set against the backdrop of the end of the British Mandate for Palestine and the early years of the State of Israel. The film details the young man's relationship with his mother and his beginnings as a writer, while looking at what happens when the stories we tell become the stories we live.

name: The Miracle of P. Tinto
summary_text: Wafer factory-owner P. Tinto and his wife Olivia want a child of their own more than anything else in the world. Years of trying, however, have left them with nothing but a pair of ...                See full summary »

name: Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
summary_text: Shawn and Gus return to Santa Barbara, California to help their old police chief, but find themselves unwelcome in their old stomping ground as they secretly untangle a case that involves the supernatural.

name: Godzilla: The Planet Eater
summary_text: Humanity, their alien allies, and Godzilla all enter their endgame as the powerful destructive entity known as Ghidorah arrives on Earth.

name: Tutta colpa di Freud
summary_text: Francesco Taramelli is a psychoanalyst who is dealing with three patients going through various hurdles in their love lives: Marta is chasing a deaf-mute man who has stolen things from her ...                See full summary »

name: On the Beach
summary_text: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

name: Zanjeer
summary_text: A tough and honest police officer clashes with a crime boss who, unbeknownst to him, happens to be his parents' murderer.

name: Göta kanal eller Vem drog ur proppen?
summary_text: To get an order for 1,000 yachts from a middle-east sheik, two boat companies have to race 'Göta kanal', a canal through Sweden, east to west. There are no rules in this game and the winner gets the order.

name: Love Me Tender
summary_text: At the end of the Civil War, a Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union payroll train but the war ends leaving these men with their Union loot, until the Feds come looking for it.

name: Ui-hyeong-je
summary_text: A fired South Korean agent and a deserted North Korean spy meet by chance after six years and start a business partnership, each with the intention of stealing information from the other.

name: The Girl in the Park
summary_text: Still traumatized by the disappearance of her three-year-old daughter 15 years ago, Julia Sandburg's old psychic wounds painfully resurface when she meets Louise; a troubled young woman with a checkered past.

name: Moving McAllister
summary_text: Law intern Rick aims for the top. He tells his boss he'll do anything - incl. drive the cute wild niece Miami to LA. Back well prepared for bar exam 3 days later?

name: The Discovery of Heaven
summary_text: God is disappointed with the human race and wants his stone tablets back. An angel is given the assignment and, with Gabriëls help, tries to manipulate several humans on earth to get his ...                See full summary »

name: Fung wan: Hung ba tin ha
summary_text: An evil warlord takes in 2 students (Wind & Cloud) in an effort to become invincible so he can take over the world.

name: Executive Suite
summary_text: When the head of a large manufacturing firm dies suddenly from a stroke, his vice presidents vie to see who will replace him.

name: Impetigore
summary_text: Maya with her best friend, Dini, tries to survive in a city without a family. She realized that she might inherit a property from her rich family. Maya returns to the village with Dini and unaware of the danger was waiting for her.

name: The Awakening of Motti Wolkenbruch
summary_text: Young Jewish man bucks orthodox traditions (and mother's meddling) by shaving, shopping outside the faithful, and considering a shiksa for a wife.

name: Lower City
summary_text: Lifelong friends Deco and Naldinho, who own a small steaming boat in Bahia, meet strip-dancer Karinna. Both men fall for her and their friendship is deeply shattered.

name: Tunes of Glory
summary_text: After World War II, a Highland Regiment's acting Commanding Officer, who rose from the ranks, is replaced by a peace-time Oxford-educated Commanding Officer, leading to a dramatic conflict between the two.

name: Torremolinos 73
summary_text: Set in 1973 Spain, a struggling encyclopedia salesman and his wife take advantage of an offer to make adult films. The act turns him into an aspring legit filmmaker and her into an international sex symbol.

name: The Holy Girl
summary_text: 16-year-old Amalia looks to save the soul of a middle-aged doctor.

name: Cymbeline
summary_text: A gritty story of a take-no-prisoners war between dirty cops and an outlaw biker gang. A drug kingpin is driven to desperate measures.

name: The Good Witch
summary_text: A darkly beautiful and mysterious woman comes in to town and inhabits the local haunted mansion, making everyone wonder if she's a witch or "The Grey Lady".

name: Sex and the Single Girl
summary_text: A womanizing reporter for a sleazy tabloid magazine impersonates his hen-pecked neighbor in order to get an expose on renowned psychologist Helen Gurley Brown.

name: Maalik
summary_text: A man of Pakistan's Elite Special Forces whose life gets entangled with Politics. They soon realize that serving the nation is more complicated than simple following of orders.

name: Judas Kiss
summary_text: A couple and two hired hands kidnap a business owner for a four million dollar ransom. A woman is killed. Collateral damage? The F.B.I. gets involved.

name: Magyar vándor
summary_text: Hungarian Vagabond is the funny and adventurous time travel of the seven Hungarian chieftains from the ninth century until nowdays. Full of cultural and historical references depicted in a ...                See full summary »

name: Chris Rock: Bring the Pain
summary_text: The second HBO stand-up special by Chris Rock.

name: Les Enfants Terribles
summary_text: The dangerously obsessive relationship between a psychologically manipulative brother and sister who isolate themselves and draw others into their mind games.

name: Burning Man
summary_text: An English chef with a chic restaurant on Bondi Beach trying to put his life and his relationship with his son back on track while surrounded by women.

name: House of Last Things
summary_text: A mind-bending thriller set in Portland, Oregon about an unspoken tragedy and its effects on a house, its temporary caretakers and the owners, a classical music critic and his wife on a recuperative trip to Italy.

name: Twin Falls Idaho
summary_text: Conjoined twins have their relationship tested when a woman takes interest in one of them.

name: Supercop 2
summary_text: As a crime wave sweeps through Hong Kong, the police call on Jessica Yang, a rising star in their ranks, to help stop a notorious gang of thieves.

name: What a Man
summary_text: What a Man: The young teacher Alex is abandoned by his girlfriend Caroline and therefore begins a journey in search of himself. But how he overcomes the pitfalls out there for a modern man? And what is it that makes a man a man?

name: The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
summary_text: When deaf mute Singer moves to a small city to be near his only friend confined in a hospital, he grows attached to his landlady's sensitive 16-year-old daughter.

name: Still/Born
summary_text: Mary, a new mother, gives birth to twins, but only one of them is alive. While taking care of her living child, Adam, she suspects that something, a supernatural entity, has chosen him and ...                See full summary »

name: The Two Mrs. Carrolls
summary_text: An artist forms an attachment with a woman on holiday in the country. As the relationship develops, his behavior and information about his past cause her increasing concern.

name: Undine
summary_text: Undine works as a historian lecturing on Berlin's urban development. But when the man she loves leaves her, the ancient myth catches up with her. Undine has to kill the man who betrays her and return to the water.

name: Kings & Queen
summary_text: Parallel storylines tell the current state of affairs for two ex-lovers: Nora's a single mother who comes to care for her terminally ill father; holed in up in mental ward, Ismael, a brilliant musician, plots his escape.

name: Purgatory
summary_text: An outlaw band rides into a town that is actually Purgatory, between Heaven and Hell.

name: A Film with Me in It
summary_text: A broke, jobless actor and a broke, jobless screenwriter set out to make a movie and then find that life starts imitating art.

name: Kaun?
summary_text: While alone in the house, a woman hears news of serial killer on the loose. And then a stranger rings the doorbell...

name: Paris-Manhattan
summary_text: Alice, a Woody Allen-obsessed pharmacist and hopeless romantic, meets a charming man named Victor but has trouble committing to him.

name: Generation P
summary_text: A chronicle of the rise of the advertising industry in Post-Soviet Russia.

name: Everybody's Fine
summary_text: Matteo decides to take a trip across Italy to go visiting his five children.

name: The Lords of Flatbush
summary_text: Two members of a social club in 1950s Brooklyn have more interest in romance than in rumbles.
